hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green1 \text{ red ant}\\
+&\underline{ \blue{?} \text{ black ants}}\\
=&\pink{20} \text{ ants in total}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{20} \text{ ants in total}\\
-&\underline{ \green1 \text{ red ant}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ black ants}\end{align}$

question.content:
There are $20$ ants eating some crumbs. $1$ was a red ant and the rest were black ants.

**How many were black ants? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] black ants
